title: OPL Contest Winner
body: So i won a contest from LoL oceania said that my question was on the stream and i did the instruction. I emailed Maraudaur my name address and he got my email and asked me for my twitter handle (i forgot to include my twitter handle in my first email) then i gave my twitter handle and phone number after that he had not reply back my email if the price will send to me or not.

replies.body:
Hey Essy,

Apologies for not replying to your email. Your prize will be sent out early next week and should arrive late next week.
